name: Sweet D.R.I.M.S.
description: "Sweet Drims" is a prototype for a 2D cyberpunk puzzle solving game. In the not so distant future where the corporations control the world you play as Ruby - a cyborg rebel and a muscle for hire. When her childhood friend Lily, who works for one of the biggest tech companis, goes missing right before the launch of their long awaited product "D.R.I.M.S.",  Ruby has to investigate.
